definition: trimming used to decorate clothes or curtains, to form or weave into a decorative band
details:
noun
- trimming used to decorate clothes or curtains
= synonyms: gold braid, braiding
- a hairdo formed by braiding or twisting the hair
= synonyms: twist
verb
- to form or weave into a decorative band
= example: to form or weave into a decorative band
= synonyms: pleach
- to decorate with braids or ribbons
= example: to decorate with braids or ribbons
- to make by braiding or interlacing
= example: to make by braiding or interlacing
= synonyms: lace, plait
